name: i-Jackson
description:
--made by Ahmet Efekaan Efe & Burak Çayırlı with Python / Pygame for mağara jam (the theme of the jam is system failure)

STORY:

Finally, Turkey has succeed to make a flight to the moon without a human. The launching from Earth was successful, but the spacecraft encountered a problem while descending to the Moon's surface and the whole system failed. However, a robot, i-Jackson, has survived, but this robot has a slightly different sense of humour. He is a big Michael Jackson, he will try to collect pieces fell from the ship while moonwalking and listening to M.J. Will he be able to succeed in this mission? LET´S FIND OUT!!!

KEY BINDINGS: Left_Arrow = change direction to the left Right_Arrow = change direction to the right Up_Arrow = makes you faster Down_Arrow = makes you slower M = on/off music R = restarts the game ESC = quit menus or game

Ahmet Efekaan Efe, Burak Çayırlı : Programmer
